title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 585.12 - Recordkeeping
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 585.12 - Recordkeeping

State Regulations
(a) The family care
provider, with assistance and supervision from the program sponsor, will
maintain a medication record. The medication record must include a complete
accounting of all residents' medication stored and/or administered in the
family care home. (b) The family
care provider shall maintain a complete and current set of family care policy
guidelines as issued by the office. (c) The family care provider shall maintain a
complete and current file of all correspondence relating to the operating
certificates of the family care home. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
585.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
